728619f-a.text:
20 Bristol Ave., adjoining the N.W. corner of Little Clove Road, showing the Swedish Home for the Aged, formerly the home of L. B. Labau, husband of Alitia Vanderbilt, daughter of Commmodore
Cornelius Vanderbilt.
October 20, 1923.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
